title: vincent l. ott
text:
software

see raincloud plots



peer-reviewed articles

Informative data visualization with raincloud plots in JASP
Ott, van den Bergh, Boutin, van Doorn, Bartoš, Judd, van Langen, Korthals, Kievit, Groot, & Wagenmakers
accepted at Behavior Research Methods, read

Fair coins tend to land on the same side they started: Evidence from 350,757 flips
Bartoš, Sarafoglou, Godmann, 24 co-authors, Ott, 21 co-authors, & Wagenmakers
Journal of the American Statistical Association, read

When you want to forget but fail, you remember contextual details notably well
Ott*, Höhs*, & Rummel | *equal contribution
Journal of Experimental Psychology: Learning, Memory, and Cognition, read

title: vincent l. ott
text:
tutorial | paper | blogpost
JASP is a free statistics program with a convenient graphical user interface.
With it you can create incredibly useful raincloud plots.

title: vincent l. ott
text:
astronaut spacewalking
A spacewalk is “any activity in outer space outside a spacecraft” (Wikipedia).








Based on the paper by Corlett et al. (2020). Bottom plot done in mere clicks.
Technically, both space and moon walk times are shown (extravehicular activity).
